overview:
Anthony Davian is a hedge fund manager, serial entrepreneur, and the founder and CEO of davianletter.com and stock.ly.

Anthony has been trading the markets since 2001, and the first position that he ever took lost 100% of its value, but he vowed from then on to learn as much as he could. He has not looked back since, and he has outperformed the S&P 500 every year since 2002. Anthony was born in Cleveland, Ohio, graduated from Holy Name High School in 1998, and earned a B.S. from The University of Akron in Accountancy.
